channel.title: Few problems
channel.description:
Hello guys I am not very good at colding at all I just like to change npc locations and play around on them for personal use. Anyways.. I found a few problems and I don't know what to do I tried to look them up but couldn't find answers. Please help me. Thank. :)
1. How can I change the gameframe from 562 on this to 483 every time I log in. Because currently it goes back to 562 each time I reload. I like 483's look better. [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/4g4t3.png[/img]
2. How can I remove skills this server has pk skill dung and summoning I do not want them on the skills list or anything.
3. How can I fix it clicking friends tab or whatever on the bottom row when I drop an item. Like when I click drop if its over the friend's,enemy or clanchat or anything on bottom row it will open that tab when dropping that item. It gets annoying lol
Thanks to anyone who will spend a little time to explain theses fixes to me (a newb wanna be colder :P).

item.title: Few problems
item.dc:creator: @HIGHK9 HIGHK9
item.description:
@HIGHK9 wrote:

Hello guys I am not very good at colding at all I just like to change npc locations and play around on them for personal use. Anyways…
I found a few problems and I don’t know what to do I tried to look them up but couldn’t find answers. Please help me. Thank.

  1. How can I change the gameframe from 562 on this to 483 every time I log in. Because currently it goes back to 562 each time I reload. I like 483’s look better.

  2. How can I remove skills this server has pk skill dung and summoning I do not want them on the skills list or anything.

  3. How can I fix it clicking friends tab or whatever on the bottom row when I drop an item. Like when I click drop if its over the friend’s,enemy or clanchat or anything on bottom row it will open that tab when dropping that item. It gets annoying lol

Thanks to anyone who will spend a little time to explain theses fixes to me (a newb wanna be colder :P).
